problem.markdown:
>>When should you convert a pivot table to formulas?<<
( ) To enable filter functionality. (x) To get more flexibility in arranging the positioning of the cells. ( ) To enable drill-down functionality. ( ) To connect filtering to an existing slicer.
[explanation] You can convert a pivot table into cube formulas. You might do this to gain flexibility in arranging the positioning of the cells to create a "free-format" report. [explanation]
problem.p: When should you convert a pivot table to formulas?
